testsuite.name: com.employee.demo.controller.EmployeeControllerTest

testcase.name: given valid update request, when calling updateEmployee(), then return updated employee()
given valid delete request, when calling deleteEmployee(), then return success()
given valid get request, when calling retrieveAllEmployees(), then return customers()
given create valid create request, when calling createEmployee(), then return success()
